mapper.update:
update virtual_goods
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
pub_time = #{pubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_remark = #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
goods_type=#{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update virtual_goods set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img_url = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pub_time = #{pubTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_remark = #{auditRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, goods_type = #{goodsType,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
